HeavyHorst/remco

Configuration management tool using key/value stores and templates

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Graphical interface for version control
  • Deployment and configuration management tool
  • CLI tool for FastAPI project generation
  • open source in-memory key/value datastore, forked from Redis, supports many data structures and plugins
  • Real-time automation and configuration management
  • Centralized management platform for MCP servers and credentials
  • Node editor for creating FastMCP servers
  • Generates FastAPI projects with database integrations
  • Rclone desktop app for managing cloud storage
